subject: Hockey, Ice
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Nicklas Lidstrom, a seven-time winner of the Norris Trophy as the N.H.L.’s top defenseman, led the seven-member class elected to the Hockey Hall of Fame.
snippet: Nicklas Lidstrom, a seven-time winner of the Norris Trophy as the N.H.L.’s top defenseman, led the seven-member class elected to the Hockey Hall of Fame.
